description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android app built with Jetpack Compose. It sets up the app theme, navigation between screens like noting list, viewing, creating, and editing notes. It also initializes an in-memory notes repository and manages UI states for different screens. The file includes composable functions for UI components such as TopBar, NotesListScreen, CreateEditScreen, ViewNoteScreen, and utility UI states like LoadingState and EmptyState.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Entry point of the Android app, setting up Compose content and theme.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets the content view to Compose UI that hosts the app.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Defines the app's Material theme with custom colors.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalNotesApp
methods.description: Main composable that manages app state, navigation, and UI components.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Displays the top app bar with title and optional back navigation.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Displays the list of notes retrieved from the repository.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: UI representation of a single note in the list.

methods.name: CreateEditScreen
methods.description: UI for creating or editing a note.

methods.name: ViewNoteScreen
methods.description: UI for viewing note details and options to edit or delete.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Displays a message when there are no notes.
